document_data.caption: A map showing Water Street in south Daggerford.
document_data.name: Water Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Water Street''' was a road found in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: Water Street ran through the southern central section of Daggerford near the [[River Gate]]. It originated on the [[Trade Way (Daggerford)|Trade Way]], branching south before making a right-angle turn to continue east until ending at the [[Hill Road]]. [[Kaoth Alley]] was connected to Water Street.
document_data.Notable Locations:
Notable buildings located along Water Street included:
* The [[Black Stone Inn]]
* Daggerford's constable
* The [[Blacksmiths' Guildhouse]]
* The [[Flying Fish]]
